trans-unit.source: Represents the Windows user prior to an impersonation operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示模擬作業前的 Windows 使用者。

trans-unit.source: This class reverts a user's identity after the user impersonates another user.
trans-unit.target: 使用者模擬另一位使用者之後，這個類別就會還原使用者的身分識別。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個型別實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>所佔用。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰**永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext> object's **Finalize** method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>物件的**Finalize**方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>參考。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Reverts the user context to the Windows user represented by this object.
trans-unit.target: 還原到此物件所代表之 Windows 使用者的使用者內容。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to use this method for any purpose other than to revert identity to self.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試還原識別設為本身以外使用此方法用於任何用途。
